content: ऐश्वर्यं [ईश्वर-ष्यञ्] {@--1@} Supremacy, sovereignty; एकैश्वर्यस्थितोपि <ls>M. 1. 1</ls>; निशाचर°. {@--2@} Might, power, sway. {@--3@} Dominion. {@--4@} Affluence, wealth, greatness; °मत्तेषु <ls>Ś. 5. 18.</ls> {@--5@} Superhuman power. {@--6@} The divine faculties of omnipotence, omnipresence &c.
